content: I've been doing meal prep on the weekends, and it's really helped me eat healthier and have more energy throughout the day. I usually prep a batch of quinoa or brown rice, roasted veggies, and grilled chicken or salmon. It makes my mornings so much easier, and I feel like I'm making healthier choices. By the way, have you heard about the benefits of yoga for digestion? I've noticed that my yoga classes on Sundays at 10 am have really helped with my digestive system, and I feel more relaxed and focused after a good practice.
